commits: 45ee7eb: fix(#304): add NODE_ENV=test to test scripts and isolate env vars in tests
summary: Issue #304 implementation complete. Three files modified: (1) package.json - added NODE_ENV=test prefix to 6 test scripts so shell environment NODE_ENV is overridden, (2) tests/unit/env.test.ts - added ENV_VARS_TO_CLEAN constant and cleanEnvVars() helper called in 7 describe blocks' beforeEach to isolate from .env-sourced env vars, (3) tests/unit/lib/worktree-path-validator.test.ts - added delete process.env.ALLOWED_WORKTREE_PATHS in beforeEach. Confirmed tests/unit/db-migration-path.test.ts already has proper cleanup. All 25 env.test.ts tests pass even with NODE_ENV=production. All 3618 unit tests pass. TypeScript and ESLint checks pass with 0 errors.
